310580.name: Planetside 2 - 2nd Anniversary Bundle
310580.description:
In celebration of PlanetSide 2’s two-year anniversary, up your game with this special anniversary bundle that includes new anniversary camo, unique weapons, a six month heroic boost and MORE! Hurry, this bundle is only available until November 30th and once it’s gone, it’s gone forever!

Here's what you get in the limited time 2nd Anniversary Bundle:

  • Heroic Booster - 6 Month
  • 2nd Year Anniversary Camo for NC / TR / VS
  • Hard Light Armor NC / TR / VS - All Classes
  • Implant 5-pack
  • Hexedge TR Anniversary Knife
  • Hardlight Dagger NC Anniversary Knife
  • Damascus Edge VS Anniversary Knife
  • Scythe Anniversary Horn
  • Reaver Anniversary Horn
  • Mosquito Anniversary Horn
  • NS-15M AE LMG
  • NS Baron G5AE Shotgun
  • Prowler Anniversary Horn
  • Vanguard Anniversary Horn
  • Magrider Anniversary Horn
310580.supported_languages: 英语, 德语, 法语, 意大利语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 土耳其语
